Description: On I-81 at mile marker 145.5 in the County of Roanoke, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-29 in the County of Albemarle, in the vicinity of Greenbrier Dr; Rt. 866E/W (Albemarle County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-664 in the City of Newport News, at Monitor Merrimac Memorial Bridge Tunnel South, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 53.5 in the City of Colonial Heights, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
